授業目的: This course is neither a lecture series nor is it an academic study. Although the syllabus is set, students will lead the lessons, while the instructional staff will be available for assistance and monitoring of English-language progress.
到達目標:
The communication goals of this course are:
1.) to guide students in mastering formulaic language that both increases oral fluency and is essential to survival in an English-speaking office environment.
2.) to guide students in developing top-down and bottom-up listening that is essential to survival in an English-speaking office environment.
授業方法:
Online Format: Simultaneous and Two-way
Discussions/pair work/group activities: Students will be required to log and study new vocabulary on their own: specifically, vocab that arises in the event of a breakdown in student-to-student communication.
Discussions/pair work/group activities: Students will be required to work together to complete their email-writing workbooks.
Lectures: guidance from the instructor will come at the end of class, to clarify lessons targets/answer questions that students may have.
